task.description: create new architecture diagram based on systematic identification of which code is actually being used (multiple versions exist)

uncertainties.description: What format should the architecture diagram be in? (ASCII, Mermaid, SVG, etc.)
What level of detail is needed? (high-level overview vs detailed component diagram)
Which aspects of the system should be included? (all modules, specific layers, data flow, etc.)
Should this replace or complement the existing architecture.yaml file?
What is the current actual system architecture based on runtime usage?
Which entry points are actually being used in production?
What are all the duplicate/similar components and which versions are active?
How can we systematically trace request flow from entry to database?
Which authentication system is actually being used (multiple exist)?
Which seller/admin dashboards are the real ones?
